title: Add defanged links mode for PDF export
description: Add a "defanged" links mode that neutralizes URLs for security documents. Transforms https:// to hxxps:// and dots in domains to [.]. Could be a fifth value in the links enum or a composable defang: true boolean that layers on top of any link mode. Requires MarkdownPostProcessor for URL text transformation.

title: Implement stripped links via MarkdownPostProcessor
description: The links: stripped mode needs a MarkdownPostProcessor to unwrap <a> tags into plain text during PDF export. CSS alone (pointer-events: none, visual stripping) is not sufficient â€” the PDF renderer still embeds clickable link annotations from <a> elements. The post-processor should only activate during print/export, not in normal reading view.

title: Add signature block toggle for PDF export
description: Add a signatureBlock toggle (per-doc only) that renders a formal sign-off area at the bottom of exported PDFs. Lines for Prepared by, Approved by, Date. Design question: blank lines for pen signatures vs structured frontmatter fields.
